description:
The second season of Masamune-kun no Revenge.

Masamune and Adagaki return for more romantic antics, this time on a school trip to France!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.romaji: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru.
Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai: Tensaitachi no Renai Zunousen

name.native: ミュリ・エルベッソン
